channel.title: Adding global objects?
channel.description:
Hey guys i need a tut on how to add global objects, im trying to create a orignal train area, ive made my space and added npcs, all i need do now is add global object, like walls and bank booths?
Any idea's!!
Don't say search... Because i have and people just give links to threads, but the thread doesn't even egsist!
(sorry for my spelling)
johno :confused:

item.title: Adding global objects?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code] public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType) { // Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
if (p != null) {
client person = (client) p;

			if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) {
				if (person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60) {
					person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

public void NewObjects() {  
	makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, oooo, dd, 10);
}[/code]

Replace ‘xxxx’ with the X coordinate of the object.
Replace ‘yyyy’ with the Y coordinate of the object.
Replace ‘oooo’ with the ID of the object.
Replace ‘dd’ with the direction the object will be facing.

Now, in packet 121 (case 121), add this;

		NewObjects();

Read full topic
